A単o: Local execs may no longer declare ECQ sans nod of nat'l gov't tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735511 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735511/ano-local-execs-may-no-longer-declare-ecq-sans-nod-of-nat-l-gov-t/story/ Local officials may no longer declare an enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) in their areas without the approval of the national government, Interior Secretary Eduardo A単o said Friday."Ngayon po, hindi na po pwede na mag-unilateral declaration ang isang local chief executive na ilalagay niya ang isang probinsya sa ECQ. Ito ay kailangang aprubado ng IATF (Inter-Agency Task Force)," A単o said at a Malaca単ang press briefing. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 22:38:21 +0800
Ilang netizen na nag-birthday ngayong ECQ, kakaiba ang naging 'handa' tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735508 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735508/ilang-netizen-na-nag-birthday-ngayong-ecq-kakaiba-ang-naging-handa/story/ Dahil limitado ang kita at kilos ngayong umiiral ang enhanced community quarantine, nakaisip ng paraan ang ilang nagdiwang ngayon ng kaarawan kung papaano magiging magarbo ang kanilang handa pero hindi mabigat sa bulsa. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 22:34:45 +0800

He is a victim. It cannot be that no one is held responsible for his death," she added. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 20:31:47 +0800
